availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William M. Chandler (Calloway County, KY, prov govt)

body.p: Calloway County, Kentucky, carding business operator and member of provisional government. Kentucky native. Son of E. P. Chandler and Nancy Chandler. Married to Virginia Chandler. Carding business operator in Calloway County, Kentucky in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville, Kentucky, in November 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Calloway County, District 2, p. 440A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Calloway County, p. 226.
